Package com.umidity.api.caller

Class AsyncCaller

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
com.umidity.api.caller.AsyncCaller
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class AsyncCaller
extends java.lang.Thread
AsyncCaller lets you make asynchronous calls to the OpenWeather API.
Because you can't get responses directly form the AsyncCaller, you should add a listener using the addListener() method before any call is performed.

    • getByCityId

      private void getByCityId​(java.lang.Integer[] args) throws java.io.IOException
      Makes call to "By City Id" api. If there are more than one argument, it will make a call for each argument.
      Parameters:
      args - a list of city ids (a list of Strings)
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException
